title: Mr Reporter
author: Mr Reporter
content: You want to reduce fuel consumption for your car, read for this. Fuel price is too cost in Nigeria.https://punchng.com/ways-to-reduce-your-fuel-consumption/Another is that solar for home is good than fuel generator for Naija. Buy solar.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on July 22, 2023, 08:33:30 AMYou want to reduce fuel consumption for your car, read for this. Fuel price is too cost in Nigeria.https://punchng.com/ways-to-reduce-your-fuel-consumption/Another is that solar for home is good than fuel generators for Naija. Buy solar.I agree with you on that,¬† I got a solar system installed in my home since the last winter and I can assure you that I have not been off light since then,¬† I generate enough power from the sun that can power my entire house with a smart inverter fridge,¬† although we have a stable power supply but not up to 20 hours a day so with my solar system have a basic alternative that power my house for the remaining hours that electricity will be off. For anyone in the remote working and cryptocurrency activities within Nigeria, you need to have an alternative power supply that can power your device for a long duration of time if electricity is gone,¬† and generators are not the best alternatives right now,¬† solar has proven to be better since the cost of fueling and servicing is off from solar.

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.body: This article is undoubtedly helpful, but some of the advice provided may not be entirely within my control to implement. For instance, it suggests avoiding harsh braking, but considering the presence of bad roads and reckless drivers, this may be a challenge that we'll have to cope with for a considerable time

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on July 22, 2023, 08:33:30 AMYou want to reduce fuel consumption for your car, read for this. Fuel price is too cost in Nigeria.https://punchng.com/ways-to-reduce-your-fuel-consumption/Another is that solar for home is good than fuel generator for Naija. Buy solar.It is a nice advice on how to reduce fuel cost but from my own point,it is better to convert your car cabreator to gas as gas is cheaper compare to petrol. Solar should be used in houses and stores that is a good idea because solar energy replenishes and Nigeria is a good country for solar energy because of the abundant sunlight No need of spending too much if you can afford solar,there is a solar that can pump water. The earlier the better because fuel price fit reach 1k soon

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on July 22, 2023, 08:33:30 AMYou want to reduce fuel consumption for your car, read for this. Fuel price is too cost in Nigeria.https://punchng.com/ways-to-reduce-your-fuel-consumption/Another is that solar for home is good than fuel generator for Naija. Buy solar.One does not need to be told to do fuel economization before he applied wisdom to how he consume fuel for daily use, there are alternatives means to use of premium motor spirit if we can device out some new ways and techniques and use them, there's use of biogas, solar system, renewable energy source, wind energy and many more ways which we can use to lessen the dependency on petroleum fuel consumption for daily use.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: This present situation has thought a lot of people how to manage things financially, the way the increase in fuel price is going even the rich are suffering from it, the increase in fuel price has worsened a lot of situations, if you have the money to buy the fuel you can't find a place to buy it in some areas, and if you don't have the money to buy the fuel that's your own cross to carry because you are going to park your car till only God knows when, this is a nice idea but a lot of people will not be opportuned to have the Access to it just like nowadays we do use cooking gas on our Generators but still people are still scared of the ideas, using cooking gas on our Generators is risky but I haven't seend it caused any harm till date, although everything is risky.Prove me wrong .

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Eh be like the help link no be for me, as I never get car way I wan learn how to reduce dy manage fuel with am üòèBut funny enough diz fuel matter really been start as play play but now eh don they turn to serious something bcuz the way I they look am nah permanent price eh wan enter so and we go just gat to accept am like dat 4 good faith. If no be to pay transportation go place as the price go high, me I for no reason diz their mata as eh for tire them. As God use style bless me 4 my 2 area way I dy mostly base, we and NEPA get small mutual agreement. We still dy enjoy am, if the fuel issue bad pass like diz i carry my Gen sell give Aboki. Bcuz I eh fit dy their spoil, no be me go buy fuel #700 per liter come put.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on July 22, 2023, 08:33:30 AMYou want to reduce fuel consumption for your car, read for this. Fuel price is too cost in Nigeria.https://punchng.com/ways-to-reduce-your-fuel-consumption/Another is that solar for home is good than fuel generator for Naija. Buy solar.Thank you op and I find this information quite educative, but all these will only help to reduce fuel consumption to a very minimal level. Quote from: Wiwo on July 22, 2023, 11:35:44 AMI generate enough power from the sun that can power my entire house with a smart inverter fridge, ¬†although we have a stable power supply but not up to 20 hours a day so with my solar system have a basic alternative that power my house for the remaining hours that electricity will be off. Some persons are beginning to look for other alternatives like using cooking gas to power their generators and I heard it's better than the petrol. Inverters are also better alternative to petrol generators especially this economic trying times we find ourselves.Quote from: Nwada001 on July 22, 2023, 10:45:23 PMWe still dy enjoy am, if the fuel issue bad pass like diz i carry my Gen sell give Aboki. Bcuz I eh fit dy their spoil, no be me go buy fuel #700 per liter come put.Even de car wey person dey use hustle some time, ah no dey fit use am because business no good again... I don made up my mind to cover am tapolene make de car rest and make me self rest.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: sokani on July 23, 2023, 01:45:12 PMSome persons are beginning to look for other alternatives like cooking gas to power their generators and I heard it's better than the petrol. Inverters are also better alternative to petrol generators especially this economical trying times we find ourselves. Omo that gas something I no no how eh dy work but as I see the settings I perceive am as something way noSafe at all, as gas too dy explosive pass the fuel and 4 where children dy me I no fit even reason to run that kind setting any small thing now, nah you and landlord go they battle 4 court on how u wan carry rebuild him house.Quote Even car wey person dey use hustle sometimes, ah no dey fit use am because business no good again... I don made up my mind to cover am tapolene make de car rest and make me self rest. No be small, Bolt men way dy my area me and dem don they drag who go stay house pass this days as dem no they carry dre car comot again, every body they use leg Waka now. As u cover am so, some times too they try remove am start am small make eh no kuku from dre spoil u come they think how to work car way nothing do b4 u park am

comments.author: Adams0001
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on July 22, 2023, 09:32:55 PMThis present situation has thought a lot of people how to manage things financially, the way the increase in fuel price is going even the rich are suffering from it, the increase in fuel price has worsened a lot of situations, if you have the money to buy the fuel you can't find a place to buy it in some areas, and if you don't have the money to buy the fuel that's your own cross to carry because you are going to park your car till only God knows when, this is a nice idea but a lot of people will not be opportuned to have the Access to it just like nowadays we do use cooking gas on our Generators but still people are still scared of the ideas, using cooking gas on our Generators is risky but I haven't seend it caused any harm till date, although everything is risky.Prove me wrong . Some of our leaders don't feel am for body self, say fuel done increase because dey get money na the poor people dey suffer for our Naija very well now, because everything just dey increase money anytime, some employee go just dey go work twice a week because of the issue of fuel, if fuel increase foodstuffs go add money too, we can't do without fuel, we can't do without fuel. We utilize him to import things from different states. Many people now use cooking gas since everything in our country is increasing, but I see gas has been reduced in price, but gas is highly dangerous for houses because he has a horrible pass petroleum self.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: Sim_card on July 22, 2023, 03:53:59 PMQuote from: Mr Reporter on July 22, 2023, 08:33:30 AMYou want to reduce fuel consumption for your car, read for this. Fuel price is too cost in Nigeria.https://punchng.com/ways-to-reduce-your-fuel-consumption/Another is that solar for home is good than fuel generator for Naija. Buy solar.It is a nice advice on how to reduce fuel cost but from my own point,it is better to convert your car cabreator to gas as gas is cheaper compare to petrol. Solar should be used in houses and stores that is a good idea because solar energy replenishes and Nigeria is a good country for solar energy because of the abundant sunlight No need of spending too much if you can afford solar,there is a solar that can pump water. The earlier the better because fuel price fit reach 1k soonOmo no be lie because the price dey increase everyday by day and the worst part about this whole increase in price be say the thing affect me badly as dem no dey ever bring light for we area and ever since nai me I resort to this your advice of using solar because it's very helpful and save a lot of unnecessary expenses.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on July 22, 2023, 08:33:30 AMYou want to reduce fuel consumption for your car, read for this. Fuel price is too cost in Nigeria.https://punchng.com/ways-to-reduce-your-fuel-consumption/Another is that solar for home is good than fuel generator for Naija. Buy solar.Na rich people dey on generator anyhow for dis country now ooo, if no be say anything urgent dey wey I wan use light do, and Nepa light no dey I no dey go near generator. If you get car for dis country now and you wan reduce d amount wey u dey spend on fuel, d best thing na to just follow commercial transport and you go reduce money wey u go spend on fuel, but the funniest part be say even commercial transporter‚Äôs self don add money anyhow now, but e go still better pass if you carry your own car commot. If you get house now and you wan dey get light always, the best thing wey you go do na just to lock up do solar for your house, I know say solar dey expensive but if you don run am once e don turn your own already, na minor maintenance go remain wey u go dey do. Some people dey wey dey use gas for their generator and dey talk say e dey very economical, but I never try am before and I no sabi how risky it is and how e dey economical reach.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Op with the way fuel price be now for we naija, you no need to advice anybody now, people dey very wise now, Dem know wetin Dem want, it just that say the cost for the installation of solar now go dey very high because in Nigeria when the price of fuel goes up, every other commodity price too go go up, This solar matter wey you talk na better idea shall, but believe me or not no be everybody wey go fit afford solar, e get some people wey Never even touch their generator ever since the fuel price increase to 530, not to talk of now wey e dey 617, so imagine who no fit buy fuel, how en want take install solar, so e no easy.Another thing be say naija sabi adapt to anything change shall, as the price of fuel increase now, many people don dey power their generator with gas, I no know how Dem take do am shall, but na so I dey see, and I believe say e go dey dangerous, but people dey say na gas be the best option for now till when the price of fuel go reduce..
